an11.2:4.1: * “Sīlavato, bhikkhave, sīlasampannassa na cetanāya karaṇīyaṃ:
an11.2:4.3: Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yaṃ sīlavato sīlasampannassa avippaṭisāro uppajjati.
an11.2:5.3: Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yaṃ avippaṭisārissa pāmojjaṃ uppajjati.
an11.2:6.3: Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yaṃ pamuditassa pīti uppajjati.
an11.2:7.3: Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yaṃ pītimanassa kāyo passambhati.
an11.2:8.3: Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yaṃ passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vediyati.
an11.2:9.3: Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yaṃ sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati.
an11.2:10.2: ‘yathābhūtaṃ jānāmi passāmī’ti*.
an11.2:10.3: Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yaṃ samāhito yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passati.
an11.2:11.1: Yathābhūtaṃ, bhikkhave, jānato passato na cetanāya karaṇīyaṃ:
an11.2:11.3: Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānaṃ passaṃ nibbindati.
an11.2:12.3: Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yaṃ nibbinno virajjati.
an11.2:13.3: Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yaṃ viratto vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ sacchikaroti.
an11.2:14.1: Iti kho, bhikkhave, virāgo vimuttiñāṇadassanattho vimuttiñāṇadassanānisaṃso, nibbidā virāgatthā virāgānisaṃsā, yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ nibbidatthaṃ nibbidānisaṃsaṃ, samādhi yathābhūtañāṇadassanattho yathābhūtañāṇadassanānisaṃso, sukhaṃ samādhatthaṃ samādhānisaṃsaṃ, passaddhi sukhatthā sukhānisaṃsā, pīti passaddhatthā passaddhānisaṃsā, pāmojjaṃ pītatthaṃ pītānisaṃsaṃ, avippaṭisāro pāmojjattho pāmojjānisaṃso, kusalāni sīlāni avippaṭisāratthāni avippaṭisārānisaṃsāni.
an11.2:14.2: Iti kho, bhikkhave, dhammā dhamme abhisandenti, dhammā dhamme paripūrenti apārā pāraṃ gamanāyā”ti.
